pages.text: Chromatic Iron is an ore that can spawn in plentiful veins $(l)below Y: -32$(), sometimes exposed to the surface.$(br2)When mined, it yields $(l)Raw Chromatic Iron$(). The amount of Raw Chromatic Iron dropped per ore can be increased with $(l)fortune$().

pages.title: Chromatic Iron
pages.text: Raw Chromatic Iron can be smelted into $(l)Chromatic Iron Ingots$(). $(br2)Chromatic Iron Ingot is used in a lot $(l)recipes$().$(br2)Only $(l)some$() has to be found in the overworld, as it can also be found $(l)within Vaults$().
